sodas.name: Fizz
sodas.description: An effervescent fruity experience with hints of grape and coriander.

sodas.name: Pop
sodas.description: An explosion of flavor that will knock your socks off!

sodas.name: Cola

sodas.name: Mega Pop
sodas.description: Not for the faint of heart. So flavorful and so invigorating, it should probably be illegal.
